patterns.description: Afternoon play session at the park
sample_texts: Spent the afternoon playing at the park.
Had fun on the swings and slides this afternoon.
Great afternoon of outdoor play at the local park.
Kids enjoyed the playground equipment this afternoon.
Beautiful afternoon for park play and fresh air.

patterns.description: Early morning nap taken in crib
sample_texts: Took a short nap in the crib at 7am.
Finally fell asleep in crib early in the morning.
Had his morning nap in the crib around 6:30am.
She settled down for an early morning sleep in her crib.
Quick crib nap before breakfast this morning.
Bath time before bed, getting ready to sleep.
Had a nice warm bath as part of bedtime routine.
Gave him a bath before putting him down for the night.
Bath and story time before bedtime.
She loves her evening bath before sleep.

patterns.description: Lunch eaten outdoors as a picnic
sample_texts: Had a picnic lunch in the park today.
Ate our sandwiches outside on a blanket.
Family picnic lunch by the lake.
Packed lunch for outdoor picnic.
Beautiful day for a picnic lunch outside.
